# Mariner Brewing Co

Since our grand opening in 2025, our goal at Mariner Brewing Co. has been to bring new energy to Nanaimo’s social scene. We aim to provide a relaxed, welcoming space where young professionals and college students can unplug, connect, and enjoy quality craft beer.

We believe great beer leads to great conversation. Through hands-on workshops, tasting flights, and an open-style brewing environment, we make the brewing process easy to understand and fun to explore. We’re building a place where strangers become friends and every pint helps create a more vibrant, connected community—not just a place that serves drinks.

---

## What We Offer

- **Craft Beers:** A rotating selection of ales, stouts, lagers, and IPAs.  
- **Networking Nights:** Casual meet-ups for students, young professionals, and local entrepreneurs.  
- **Co-working Hours:** Quiet daytime space for productivity and collaboration.  
- **Workshops & Skill Sessions:** Brewing classes, resume/portfolio nights, and talks from local business owners.  
- **Brewery Tours:** Learn the ins and outs of our brewing process.

---

## Our Customers

Our customers are young professionals and students looking for a relaxed space to build real connections. Mariner Brewing Co. provides a unique environment where networking happens naturally—over a good conversation and a great craft beer.
